text: Joseph Michael Straczynski (born July 17, 1954) is an American comic book writer, author, journalist, and television producer. He is known for creating the television series Babylon 5. Straczynski was born on July 17, 1954 in Paterson, New JerseyJ. Michael Straczynski Biography (1954-) and studied at San Diego State University. He was married to Kathryn M. Drennan from 1983 until they divorced in 2008. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:American television producers Category:American journalists Category:Writers from New Jersey Category:People from Paterson, New Jersey
title: J. Michael Straczynski
